thread.title: Gold Perks up After a Week-Long Slide
thread.title_full: Gold Perks up After a Week-Long Slide - WSJ

author: Biman Mukherji
title: Gold Perks up After a Week-Long Slide
text: 0320 GMT [Dow Jones] Gold prices rise in early Asian trade on bargain buying Friday, regaining some ground after prices dropped during the previous week. Physical demand for gold is lackluster in India at the start of the festival season. Chinese buying picked up in September ahead of the Golden Week holiday period in early October, compensating for some of the weak sales in India. Traders are awaiting the outcome of the U.S. Federal Open Market Committee meeting on October 28, which is likely to indicate whether a rate increase is on the cards as soon as December. Gold is trading at $1,169.03/oz, up from the opening...
